Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate how success, challenge, setbacks and failure strengthen resilience and identities in a range of contexts
Elaboration: Explaining how characters in stories overcome challenge and adversity and achieve success in different ways

ContentDescription: Investigate how success, challenge, setbacks and failure strengthen resilience and identities in a range of contexts

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate how success, challenge, setbacks and failure strengthen resilience and identities in a range of contexts
Elaboration: Discussing how overcoming challenge or adversity together can unite a group of diverse people

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate how success, challenge, setbacks and failure strengthen resilience and identities in a range of contexts
Elaboration: Exploring how responses to success, challenge, setbacks and failures are influenced by cultural beliefs and values

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate how success, challenge, setbacks and failure strengthen resilience and identities in a range of contexts
Elaboration: Recognising how success, challenge, failure and enjoyment of physical activities influence identities

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Plan, rehearse and reflect on strategies to cope with the different changes and transitions they experience, such as the changes associated with puberty
Elaboration: Discussing physical, social and emotional changes that occur as individuals get older, and exploring how these changes impact how they think and feel about themselves and different situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Plan, rehearse and reflect on strategies to cope with the different changes and transitions they experience, such as the changes associated with puberty
Elaboration: Identifying people or sources of information they can access if they have questions about the changes that occur during puberty

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Plan, rehearse and reflect on strategies to cope with the different changes and transitions they experience, such as the changes associated with puberty
Elaboration: Exploring the nature of family support networks in First Nations Australian communities and discussing how a wide range of family and community members support young people when they are going through changes and transitions

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Plan, rehearse and reflect on strategies to cope with the different changes and transitions they experience, such as the changes associated with puberty
Elaboration: Practising and refining coping skills they can use when faced with challenges or changes, such as positive self-talk, problem-solving, mindfulness, seeking help from families, peers and teachers

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Plan, rehearse and reflect on strategies to cope with the different changes and transitions they experience, such as the changes associated with puberty
Elaboration: Identifying scenarios in texts where characters experience and react to change and transition, evaluating the effectiveness of these responses and identifying other possible options that may be helpful

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how choices and actions can be influenced by stereotypes

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how choices and actions can be influenced by stereotypes
Elaboration: Recognising that unfair or unequal treatment of people based on their gender, abilities or other differences is wrong and against their human rights

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how choices and actions can be influenced by stereotypes
Elaboration: Describing ways to make roles and responsibilities at home, at school and in communities fair, equitable and inclusive

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how choices and actions can be influenced by stereotypes
Elaboration: Practising ways in which they can contribute to people of different genders being treated in fair and equal ways

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Select, use and refine personal and social skills to establish, manage and strengthen relationships
Elaboration: Predicting and reflecting on how other students might feel in a range of challenging situations, and discussing what they can do to support them

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Select, use and refine personal and social skills to establish, manage and strengthen relationships
Elaboration: Describing characters in texts who have demonstrated respect for difference and diversity in individuals and communities, and exploring the strategies they used to do this

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Select, use and refine personal and social skills to establish, manage and strengthen relationships
Elaboration: Using cooperative skills and offering encouragement to successfully complete a movement task, such as a partner balance, partner passing strategy or team strategy

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Select, use and refine personal and social skills to establish, manage and strengthen relationships
Elaboration: Discussing how demonstrating respect and empathy for First Nations Australians can build positive relationships

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Select, use and refine personal and social skills to establish, manage and strengthen relationships

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how valuing diversity influences wellbeing and identify actions that promote inclusion in their communities

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how valuing diversity influences wellbeing and identify actions that promote inclusion in their communities
Elaboration: Researching and participating in games from their own and others’ cultural heritage, and learning why games are important to build cultural awareness and appreciation

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe how valuing diversity influences wellbeing and identify actions that promote inclusion in their communities
Elaboration: Describing and practising safe bystander actions when they notice unfair or disrespectful behaviour towards others

ContentDescription: Describe how valuing diversity influences wellbeing and identify actions that promote inclusion in their communities

ContentDescription: Describe how valuing diversity influences wellbeing and identify actions that promote inclusion in their communities

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explain how and why emotional responses can vary and practise strategies to manage their emotions

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Explain how and why emotional responses can vary and practise strategies to manage their emotions

ContentDescription: Explain how and why emotional responses can vary and practise strategies to manage their emotions

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Rehearse and refine strategies for seeking, giving and denying permission respectfully and describe situations when permission is required
Elaboration: Practising and refining strategies for seeking and giving consent; for example, giving consent for their photo to be shared

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Rehearse and refine strategies for seeking, giving and denying permission respectfully and describe situations when permission is required
Elaboration: Exploring actions they can take if someone has done something hurtful or disrespectful to them without their permission or consent including in online environments

Subject: Health and Physical Education

Elaboration: Exploring actions they can take when they or others are unsafe, such as saying no, leaving the situation and reporting the incident, and discussing how to use these strategies in situations in which someone posts an embarrassing picture online without permission, touches private parts of their body, or uses violence against them

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe and apply protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies in a range of online and offline situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe and apply protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies in a range of online and offline situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe and apply protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies in a range of online and offline situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe and apply protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies in a range of online and offline situations
Elaboration: Indicating on a local map the location of safe places and people who can help if they feel unsafe or scared

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe and apply protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies in a range of online and offline situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Describe and apply protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies in a range of online and offline situations

ContentDescription: Interpret the nature and intention of health information and messages, and reflect on how they influence personal decisions and behaviours

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Interpret the nature and intention of health information and messages, and reflect on how they influence personal decisions and behaviours

ContentDescription: Investigate and apply behaviours that contribute to their own and others’ health, safety, relationships and wellbeing

ContentDescription: Investigate and apply behaviours that contribute to their own and others’ health, safety, relationships and wellbeing

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Investigate and apply behaviours that contribute to their own and others’ health, safety, relationships and wellbeing

ContentDescription: Investigate and apply behaviours that contribute to their own and others’ health, safety, relationships and wellbeing

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Refine and apply fundamental movement skills in new movement situations

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Participate in physical activities to explore how their body feels and describe how regular physical activity helps the body stay healthy and well

ContentDescription: Participate in physical activities to explore how their body feels and describe how regular physical activity helps the body stay healthy and well

ContentDescription: Explore recommendations about physical activity and sedentary behaviours, and discuss strategies to achieve the recommendations

ContentDescription: Apply rules and scoring systems to promote fair play when participating or designing physical activities
